title: Greg Miller Hates Red Dead Redemption 2
description:
This game is NOTHING like Batman v Superman. 

From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rVhl74Kdrd4 

Sign up for the Kinda Funny Membership to get ad-free shows, live recordings, and daily Greg Miller vlogs. Patreon.com/KindaFunny or YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames

FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!
